name: Elemania
description:
Elemania is an Open-world Role Playing Game made in Python using mainly the Pygame library

This game is still under heavy development. I would greatly appreciate feedback and suggestions and your vision of where you want to see this game in the future!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or ARROW KEYS to move
  • E to open inventory: 
  • =-- right click to drag slots =-- left click to select slots 
  • =-- drag slots into hotbar to use them out of the menu 
  • =-- pressing the number of the hotbar slot will use/equip the item
  • ESCAPE to open menu
  • LEFT CLICK to attack with equipped item (bows need arrows equipped to work)
  • SPACE to talk to an NPC: 
  • =-- ENTER to continue dialog 
  • =-- A or D or left or right to choose dialog options 
  • =-- ESCAPE to leave the dialog at any time

There are 3 character slots, 'slot 1' has a bunch of items to test out, the other slots are empty so you can create your own character!

Join the discord server to give feedback, report bugs, get sneak peaks of future content and to discuss the game with fellow Elemania fans!
